entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5 except zero near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5 except zero near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15 except minus 11 near the Alberta border. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 11 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7 except minus 3 near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except minus 3 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 3 April 2023
